entries.journal_entry_description: The Lady Reverence, Dahlia Damask, still holds a grudge, as do the rest of the Society, against the Kerritamba for actions in the past. In order for her spies to infiltrate the village, 10 Kerritamba Warriors must fall. And the Lady has chosen you to do the job.
entries.journal_entry_title: The Road to Exemplar: Kerritamba Warriors
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Defeat 10 Kerritamba Warriors and return to Dahlia Damask.
